title: Number of Spotify employees 2011 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, containing a total of 6 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and finally slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The line rapidly increased by 208.04% from Year 2011 to 2013, and lastly, increased by 92.65% from Year 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2018.
The highest Number of employees, of value 4165.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of employees about 311.0 was reached at Year 2011
